## Signal type

The tuple that is returned when creating a signal.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type Signal<T> = [SignalReadFunction<T>, SignalWriteFunction<T>, SignalResetFunction<T>];
```
**References:** [SignalReadFunction](./flipclock.signalreadfunction.md)<!-- -->, [SignalWriteFunction](./flipclock.signalwritefunction.md)<!-- -->, [SignalResetFunction](./flipclock.signalresetfunction.md)
